description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'HomeScreen' serving as the main screen of a role-based meal ordering platform. It incorporates role selection, navigation, and role-specific content including management and overview screens for Admin, Manager, and Delivery roles.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget serving as the main interface with role-based content and navigation.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the role-based UI, navigation, and dynamic content rendering.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A helper widget to display labeled list items with icons.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: A widget displaying user's current role in a drawer header.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including app bar, content, and navigation.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Constructs the top header section with role title and role selector pills.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Provides responsive layout of role-specific management cards either in grid or column format.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Creates the role selection dropdown control.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Displays role selection pills with interactive styling.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns the header title string based on the current role.

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: Widget for Admin's orders management section.

methods.name: _adminMenu
methods.description: Widget for Admin's menu management section.

methods.name: _adminUsers
methods.description: Widget for Admin's users management section.

methods.name: _managerOrders
methods.description: Widget for Manager's orders overview section.

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: Widget for Manager's location and time slots management.

methods.name: _managerFeedback
methods.description: Widget for Manager's feedback center access.

methods.name: _deliveryAssigned
methods.description: Widget for Delivery agent's assigned deliveries.

methods.name: _deliveryHistory
methods.description: Widget for Delivery agent's delivery history.
